title: Clara Barton National Historic Site: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes        Clara Barton National Historic Site is not available for rentals or private functions. The Glen Echo Park Partnership for Arts and Culture, Inc. manages rental facilities for adjoining Glen Echo Park and you may find additional information on their website: http://www.glenechopark.org/
